name: MicroBT Enters the Petahash Club, Taking Bitcoin Mining Rigs to a New Extreme
description: The Saint of Hash, grafted brass and wet porcelain, performs the Petahash Ascension. A colossal ritual begins above the pyre of decaying memory, dissolving the self into 1.35 PH/s iridescent current. Raw power extracted through sacred geometry.

properties.caption: The Saint of Hash, grafted brass and wet porcelain, performs the Petahash Ascension. A colossal ritual begins above the pyre of decaying memory, dissolving the self into 1.35 PH/s iridescent current. Raw power extracted through sacred geometry.
